ing: 1 fluid ounce Cointreau or triple sec
5 fluid ounces sweet and sour mix
n: Mrs. Baxton's Long Island Iced Tea
des: "An old friend of mine had made this for years and swears by this recipe. I have to admit it's the best Long Island Iced Tea I've ever had."
ins: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice; pour in vodka, tequila, rum, gin, Cointreau, and sweet and sour mix. Cover and shake until the outside of the shaker is frosty. Place a few cubes of ice into a highball glass, and strain in the iced tea. Top with the cola, and garnish with a wedge of lime.
